general.gigTitle: build, design, redesign, develop, update, clone, or customize wordpress website

sellerCard.description:
Hello! I’m Emaan, a freelance WordPress developer with over 9 years of experience creating beautiful, functional websites that elevate brands and drive results. I specialize in designing and building customized solutions tailored to your unique needs, whether it’s a business website, an e-commerce platform, or a healthcare site.

With a passion for blending creativity and functionality, I focus on delivering seamless experiences—from initial design concepts to final implementation. Let’s work together to bring your vision to life and create a website that truly represents your brand!

description.content:
PLEASE READ BEFORE ORDERING: Contact me to discuss your project before placing an order!


Why Choose Me for Your WordPress Website?


  • 8+ Years Experience as a WordPress Developer
  • 100% Money-Back Guarantee
  • Unlimited Revisions until you're fully satisfied
  • Complete Guidance on web management
  • Free On-Page SEO for better search ranking


What's Included?


I specialize in creating professional, responsive websites to help your business grow:


  • Any Business Website (small, personal, or corporate)
  • User-Friendly Admin Panel
  • Theme Customization (Free or Premium)
  • Responsive Design for all devices
  • Blog with Social Sharing
  • Google Maps Integration
  • Advanced Contact Forms
  • E-commerce Setup for online stores
  • Professional Layouts
  • 24/7 Support
  • Clean, Modern Design


Types of Websites I Build:


  • Restaurants/Cafes
  • Jewelry/Boutique Stores
  • Salons and Beauty Spas
  • Home Renovation/Repair Services
  • Barbershops
  • Lead Generation Sites
  • E-commerce Stores
  • Schools, Colleges, and Academies
  • Fitness and Health
  • Real Estate Agencies
  • Consulting and Coaching
  • Law Firms
  • Personal Blogs and Portfolios


Note: Message me with your needs, and lets create the ideal website for you!

slide.name: build, design, redesign, develop, update, clone, or customize wordpress website
build, design, redesign, develop, update, clone, or customize wordpress website

questionsAndAnswers.question: I'm ready to purchase your gig! What do I need to get started?
questionsAndAnswers.answer:
First of all, you will have to purchase a domain & hosting. Feel free to discuss suggestions if you have not purchased yet. We'll also need your company logo & the name of the pages for a website. e.g. Home, About Us, Services, Contact.
You will have to provide us with the content for these pages.

questionsAndAnswers.question: I do not have the content for the website, can we start?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I will add dummy content so that you would be able to replace that with your own content in the future. The content will be dummy "Lorum Ipsum" and will not be relevant to any industry.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will I be able to edit my website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Even if you don't know any programming language, You can easily edit your website. This is the power of WordPress. After watching a few tutorials, you can change anything. I will send the tutorial at the end.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will you provide domain and hosting services?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, We do provide hosting/domain name registration services at Additional cost.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What if I have unique requirements for the project?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: In case if you don't find anything listed in my packages, and you have a unique requirement or requirement that exceeds my premium package or lies in between any package listed, please contact me, and I will provide you with a very detailed custom quotation.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will you write the content for website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, we do offer content writing services too but at an additional cost, in this package, I only work with web designing and development. Do message for more information.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Is Your Site hosted on WordPress.com?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: If Yes, Please note that we would atleast need a Business plan of WordPress.com in order to create a customized website.

openGraph.title: build, design, redesign, develop, update, clone, or customize wordpress website

reviews.comment: Habiba helped us with a small website refresh that was quite technical as there were a few issues from previous freelancers that were brought to up and remediated. Will work again with her.
I'm very grateful for her expert and persistent help.
Emaan is great to work with. I have used her for years and she is quick and incredibly professional.
Everything I needed within 24hrs thank you
Thank you - looking forward to continued work together!

notableClients.name: Pacr
notableClients.interaction_description:
I developed a complete website for steven and his company called PACR.

PACR is the better way to track your paid ad spend.

I designed and developed their business website to meet their standards and needs

https://pacr.uk/

enriched_details.name: Pacr
enriched_details.description: Pacr is a tool that allows you to track the spending (vs. budget) for all your clients across all their media channels.

notableClients.name: Cloud Moves TV
notableClients.interaction_description: Cloud Moves is a Video Advertising Agency and they hired me for the redevelopment of their old-fashioned site to something modern and appealing. Since then i have been working with them and designed 10+ websites for them and thier clients.

enriched_details.name: Cloud Moves TV
enriched_details.description: Cloud Moves TV is an online technology channel; covering news, events and jobs within the cloud mobile and social sectors.     CMTV interview inspirational thought leaders and C-level executives across leading tech verticals sharing their knowledge and...

consultationData.description:
Hello, 

I am Habiba Emaan. I lead a team of 12 Developers and We all are available to assist you about anything related to:

--WordPress CMS
--Elementor, DIVI, WPBakery, etc
--Web Hosting Setup
